name: Slingshot Match-3
description:
Slingshot Match-3

This game is my entry for the 41st Ludum Dare.

The theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres", so I went for a FPS + Match-3 in which the weapon is a slingshot. Game lasts 5 minutes tops :)

Jam entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/slingshot-match-3
